title: How can we avoid misguided advice given in respect of COVID-19? - Quora

response.answer_text: Till now, the best sources for health information about COVID-19 are the government health websites and the WHO website. These are the primary sources of reliable information. It's better to not trust unverified sources on social media and viral messaging. If you hear something from these sources, Google it and see if the message is from a reliable source. Stay safe

It's simple, actually. Think. Do more research. Read more. See if it makes sense. Be rational. Do not blindly believe in something, verify it, see if it is consistent with the other information. Repeat the process.
